subject: Divorce, Separations and Annulments
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The team’s owner, Frank McCourt, fired his wife, Jamie, the team’s chief executive, last month. The saga will now be the subtext beneath every move the Dodgers make.
snippet: The team’s owner, Frank McCourt, fired his wife, Jamie, the team’s chief executive, last month. The saga will now be the subtext beneath every move the Dodgers make.
